thread.title: 高木菜那、3位なのに銅メダルなし なぜ？（アジア大会スピードスケート）
thread.title_full: 高木菜那、3位なのに銅メダルなし なぜ？（アジア大会スピードスケート）

author: 中野渉
title: 高木菜那、3位なのに銅メダルなし なぜ？（アジア大会スピードスケート）
text:   (L-R) Italy's Arianna Fontana, Great Britain's Elise Christie and South Korea's Park Seung-Hi fall as they compete in the Women's Short Track 500 m Final at the Iceberg Skating Palace during the 2014 Sochi Winter Olympics on February 13, 2014. AFP PHOTO / YURI KADOBNOV (Photo credit should read YURI KADOBNOV/AFP/Getty Images) (L-R) South Korea's Park Seung-Hi, Great Britain's Elise Christie and Italy's Arianna Fontana fall as China's Li Jianrou (R) skates past them to win the gold medal in the Women's Short Track 500 m Final at the Iceberg Skating Palace during the 2014 Sochi Winter Olympics on February 13, 2014. AFP PHOTO / JUNG YEON-JE (Photo credit should read JUNG YEON-JE/AFP/Getty Images) Elise Christie of Britain, right, and Arianna Fontana of Italy, left, crash out as Li Jianrou of China rounds the turn as they compete in a women's 500m short track speedskating final at the Iceberg Skating Palace during the 2014 Winter Olympics, Thursday, Feb. 13, 2014, in Sochi, Russia. (AP Photo/Bernat Armangue) Great Britain's Elise Christie (L) and Italy's Arianna Fontana fall as they compete in the Women's Short Track 500 m Final at the Iceberg Skating Palace during the 2014 Sochi Winter Olympics on February 13, 2014. AFP PHOTO / ADRIAN DENNIS (Photo credit should read ADRIAN DENNIS/AFP/Getty Images) Elise Christie of Britain, front, and Arianna Fontana of Italy crash out as they compete in a women's 500m short track speedskating final at the Iceberg Skating Palace during the 2014 Winter Olympics, Thursday, Feb. 13, 2014, in Sochi, Russia. (AP Photo/Ivan Sekretarev) SOCHI, RUSSIA - FEBRUARY 13: Elise Christie of Great Britain (L) falls and collides with Arianna Fontana of Italy (R) during the Short Track Speed Skating Ladies' 500 m Final on day 6 of the Sochi 2014 Winter Olympics at at Iceberg Skating Palace on February 13, 2014 in Sochi, Russia. (Photo by Quinn Rooney/Getty Images) Great Britain's Elise Christie (C) and Italy's Arianna Fontana (R) fall as they compete in the Women's Short Track 500 m Final at the Iceberg Skating Palace during the 2014 Sochi Winter Olympics on February 13, 2014. AFP PHOTO / JUNG YEON-JE (Photo credit should read JUNG YEON-JE/AFP/Getty Images) Italy's Arianna Fontana falls as she competes in the Women's Short Track 500 m Final at the Iceberg Skating Palace during the 2014 Sochi Winter Olympics on February 13, 2014. AFP PHOTO / JUNG YEON-JE (Photo credit should read JUNG YEON-JE/AFP/Getty Images) SOCHI, RUSSIA - FEBRUARY 13: Elise Christie of Great Britain (L) falls and collides with Arianna Fontana of Italy (R) during the Short Track Speed Skating Ladies' 500 m Final on day 6 of the Sochi 2014 Winter Olympics at at Iceberg Skating Palace on February 13, 2014 in Sochi, Russia. (Photo by Clive Mason/Getty Images) Elise Christie of Britain, left, and Arianna Fontana of Italy crash out in a women's 500m short track speedskating final at the Iceberg Skating Palace during the 2014 Winter Olympics, Thursday, Feb. 13, 2014, in Sochi, Russia. (AP Photo/Darron Cummings) SOCHI, RUSSIA - FEBRUARY 13: (L-R) Seung-Hi Park of South Korea, Arianna Fontana of Italy and Elise Christie of Great Britain are consoled after the Short Track Speed Skating Ladies' 500 m Final on day 6 of the Sochi 2014 Winter Olympics at at Iceberg Skating Palace on February 13, 2014 in Sochi, Russia. (Photo by Matthew Stockman/Getty Images)  シェア
